manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: OVERVIEW: Experience your favorite movies and shows on a vibrant, stunning 4K UHD screen, using the Universal Guide to surf smoothly and select content. Everything you watch is automatically upscaled into 4K for stunningly vivid color and detail. Experience crystal clear colors that are fine-tuned to deliver a naturally crisp and vivid picture.The ultra-fast processor transforms everything you watch into stunning 4K.The sleek, elegant, and minimalistic design draws you into the screen from any angle.See what you’ve been missing on the crisp, clear picture that’s 4X the resolution of Full HD.High Dynamic Range lets you enjoy a wide spectrum of colors and visual details, even in dark scenes.Get into the game faster with Auto Game Mode which automatically optimizes the screen and minimizes input lag, giving you more control. Enjoy a smooth gaming experience without motion blur and judder

4K Picture Quality Optimized picture performance with 4K UHD Processor High Dynamic Range lets you enjoy a wide spectrum of colors and visual details, even in dark scenes. Real 4K Resolution The ultra-fast processor transforms everything you watch into stunning 4K. Knows when you're ready to play Get into the game faster with Auto Game Mode which automatically optimizes the screen and minimizes input lag, giving you more control. Enjoy a smooth gaming experience without motion blur and judder Spend time watching, not searching Universal Guide provides a list of curated content from broadcast and streaming channels, personalized just for you. Easily find your favorite content, all in one place See stunning detail Powerful picture quality Auto Game Mode (ALLM) Universal Guide

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing picture and quality for the money: SAMSUNG UN50TU7000 50" 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV
reviews.reviewText: Got this TV shortly before x-mas and timing couln't be better. Now that most of the country is working from home, I wanted a better quality picture than the 5-YO Sony HD tv I had at home. Well, the picture quality is amazing, to say the least. Watching the NFL playoffs in January with this high def 4k picture makes you feel you are actually in the game. The picture is so crystal clear that it looks better than any sports video gave they have on the market. Not only that, but the smart features give you more control over the apps you have even on your cell. I have a Samsung S20Note Ultra and when connected to the TV, I can stream any video, application or even text messages to the TV. All my other video apps, like Disney, Prime, Netflix, Hulu, etc are all pre-installed and picture quality when streaming them is truly amazing. Also, you have a lot of control over the picture quality so you can define your picture settings in a variety of ways. Samsung TV (came with the TV) also has a lot of options Well worth the $400 I spent on it. Wish I've done it sooner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this TV/extras were great too
reviews.reviewText: The picture quality is SUPER crisp and nice and I use it mainly to watch YouTube or to play video games. I may have overdone it with a 65" but the quality is worth it. The packaging came with a metal TV wall mount, an electrical socket thing that gives you 6 extra plugs, a few HDMI cords, and a packet of free subscriptions. I didn't use the subscriptions, but I was able to gift the wall mount to a friend who loved it, and so far the two HDMI cables have been great too. I have a game console and PC connected to the TV and both are able to switch seamlessly. If you have a Samsung phone there is an app that will let you control the TV with your phone and even cast your phone screen onto it. Lastly, I didn't think I would need the 6 socket plug in, but it ended up being helpful in a completely different part of the house. In all this purchase was definitely worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No issues at all.
reviews.reviewText: We had no issues setting this tv up so not sure about some of the other reviews. Crystal clear. Worth the money

reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This beautiful tv is a must buy!!! It is clear and big the remote is easy to use. And has alot of smart features! I love my tv thank you!

reviews.reviewText: Original shipment came with a cracked screen but the vendor worked quickly to make it right. Had a new unit in less than two weeks.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Picture and Sound
reviews.reviewText: The Samsung TV with wall mounting bundle was a great purchase. Great picture quality and superb sound. It comes with free Samsung TV, which is a bonus because I won't pay for cable TV.
